os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: lightweight-4over6
short_description:
Lightweight 4over6 is an extension to DS-Lite. This mechanism moves the translation function from the tunnel concentrator (AFTR) to initiators (B4s), and hence reduces the mapping scale on the concentrator to a per-subscriber level. To delegate the NAPT function to the initiators, port-restricted IPv4 addresses are allocated to the initiators.
Please refer to draft: 
http://www.ietf.org/id/draft-cui-softwire-b4-translated-ds-lite-06.txt
http://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-sun-softwire-lightweigh-4over6-deployment/
